meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or denoting a rock that is rich in magnesium and iron and low in silica.
meanings.sent1: The ultramafic minerals in the rock give it a distinct green color.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study ultramafic rocks to understand Earth's composition.
meanings.sent3: The ultramafic rock was so heavy that even Superman couldn't lift it!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the ultramafic rock beneath her feet.
meanings.sent5: The ultramafic characteristics of the stone made it stand out among the others.

meanings.sent1: Miners extracted ultramafic from deep within the earth.
meanings.sent2: The ultramafic was used in construction due to its durability.
meanings.sent3: The ultramafic seemed to have a personality of its own, refusing to be shaped.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the ultramafic represented strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The ultramafic gleamed in the sunlight, a testament to its unique properties.
